:py:mod:`qrem.common.external.ncpol2sdpa.mosek_utils`
=====================================================

.. py:module:: qrem.common.external.ncpol2sdpa.mosek_utils

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   The module contains helper functions to work with MOSEK.

   Created on Tue Nov 18 10:51:14 2014

   @author: Peter Wittek



Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   qrem.common.external.ncpol2sdpa.mosek_utils.streamprinter
   qrem.common.external.ncpol2sdpa.mosek_utils.moseksol_to_xmat
   qrem.common.external.ncpol2sdpa.mosek_utils.parse_mosek_solution

.. py:function:: streamprinter(text)

   Helper function for printing MOSEK messages in the Python console.



.. py:function:: moseksol_to_xmat(vec, block_struct)


.. py:function:: parse_mosek_solution(sdp, task)


.. py:function:: solve_with_mosek(sdp, solverparameters=None)


.. py:function:: convert_to_mosek_index(block_struct, row_offsets, block_offsets, row)

   MOSEK requires a specific sparse format to define the lower-triangular
   part of a symmetric matrix. This function does the conversion from the
   sparse upper triangular matrix format of Ncpol2SDPA.


.. py:function:: convert_to_mosek_matrix(sdp)

   Converts the entire sparse representation of the Fi constraint matrices
   to sparse MOSEK matrices.


.. py:function:: convert_to_mosek(sdp)

   Convert an SDP relaxation to a MOSEK task.

   :param sdp: The SDP relaxation to convert.
   :type sdp: :class:`ncpol2sdpa.sdp`.

   :returns: :class:`mosek.Task`.
